import React from'react';import'../styles/Pagination.css';// Ruta corregida
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Pagination=_ref=>{let{productsPerPage,totalProducts,paginate,currentPage}=_ref;const pageNumbers=[];const totalPages=Math.ceil(totalProducts/productsPerPage);const generatePageNumbers=()=>{if(totalPages<=12){for(let i=1;i<=totalPages;i++){pageNumbers.push(i);}}else{for(let i=1;i<=10;i++){pageNumbers.push(i);}pageNumbers.push('...');pageNumbers.push(totalPages-1);pageNumbers.push(totalPages);}};generatePageNumbers();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"pagination-nav",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"pagination",children:pageNumbers.map((number,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"page-item ".concat(number===currentPage?'active':''),children:number==='...'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"page-link",children:"..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{onClick:()=>paginate(number),href:"#!",className:"page-link",children:number})},index))})});};export default Pagination;
